ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | h2h.1 | |- U = <. <. +h , .h >. , normh >. |
| 2 |  | h2h.2 | |- U e. NrmCVec |
| 3 |  | h2hm.4 | |- ~H = ( BaseSet ` U ) |
| 4 |  | h2hm.5 | |- D = ( IndMet ` U ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_h2hvs | |- -h = ( -v ` U ) |
| 6 | 1, 2 | #P_h2hnm | |- normh = ( normCV ` U ) |
| 7 | 3, 5, 6, 4 | #P_imsdval | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. ~H /\ B e. ~H ) -> ( A D B ) = ( normh ` ( A -h B ) ) ) |
| 8 | 2, 7 | #P_mp3an1 | |- ( ( A e. ~H /\ B e. ~H ) -> ( A D B ) = ( normh ` ( A -h B ) ) ) |
